# image

**Instance Property**

The image to display on the button portion of a color well that adopts the expanded style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var image: NSImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The color well applies the image only when the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorWell/colorWellStyle] property is set to [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorWell/Style/expanded].

## Configuring the appearance

- **colorWellStyle**: The appearance and interaction style to apply to the color well.
- **NSColorWell.Style**: Constants that specify the appearance and interaction modes for a color well.
- **isBordered**: A Boolean value that determines whether the color well has a border.
